data.title: 匈牙利布達佩斯 DAY 1 在多瑙河上吃到飽？
data.description: 2019聖誕假期我們從維也納出發搭著火車來到了匈牙利的首都布達佩斯，出發前還發生了一件有驚無險的事，當我們在月台上等火車時，我發現我的毛帽不見了！此時離發車大概還剩下五分鐘，我回想了一下極有可能是掉在車站內的郵局，我託我朋友幫我把行李拿上車，隨即飛奔到郵局，還好真的被我找到，毛帽在歐洲是一個非常重要的保暖物品一定要找到！最後也在發車前一刻搭上火車，呼~好險。

data.title: 波蘭 Zakopane 海洋之眼— 新年第一天 來爬山吧~
data.description: 2020元旦，我與朋友乘著接駁車，從Zakopane火車站坐到了Tatra Mountains，展開了我們兩個小時痛苦的登山之旅。

data.title: Summer Session in Fudan University- Why Do My Classmates Have Good English Level
data.description: In 2018, I attended a summer school program in Fudan University. During the program, I found out how poor English I am. Hence, I decided to keep learning, speak more, and read more.

data.title: Being An Exchange Student In Poland- What I learn in Electromagnetic Waves
data.description: uring my senior year, I was lucky to have a chance to study in Poland for one semester. I had only enrolled in three courses: Polish, Probability and Electromagnetic Waves, since I would like to spend more time on traveling, perhaps less credits would be more suitable for me.
